name: V e n t u r e
name_original: V e n t u r e
description:
TopGear like Racing ""Game"" /Experiment  made on the free version of Construct 3! (also...it's a mobile game)

To make the game WideScreen , after the C3 Loading Screen tap the screen 2x!

Credits:

-Title Screen Music:   https://opengameart.org/content/90s-racer-techno

-Level Music:      https://opengameart.org/content/hyper-ultra-racing

-Countdown Voice:   https://opengameart.org/content/countdown-voiceover-robotic

-Car Sounds: made by "Fries"
